page.title: 01Impressions of the area.
page.content: The area appears to be a traditional {rural}one; flat open{farmland}with occasional wooded areas, pleasant red brick cottages and rather unsophisticated farms, but closer inspection reveals a different picture in some parts. Rolleston is indeed a traditional village with farming its principal 'raison d'etre'. Farming is important also in Fiskerton and Morton but here there are many more incomers and the majority of houses are owned by people in well paid employment. A minority of famillies have lived in the villages for generations, but their influence on the community is dwindling. Apart from employment in{farming, small {industry and services,}most people work outside the area.{Course fishing and{horse racing}attract many visitors to the parishes.
